import React, { useState } from 'react' function FormHandling() { const [userInp,setuserInp]=useState({name:'',number:''}) return (
FormHandling
submitForm(e)}>
setuserInp({...userInp,name:e.target.value})} />
setuserInp({...userInp,number:e.target.value})} />
) } export default FormHandling
